original_text: All these the sons of Jediael, by the heads of their fathers, mighty men of valour, were seventeen thousand and two hundred soldiers, fit to go out for war and battle.
korean_text: 이 여디아엘의 아들들은 모두 그 집의 우두머리요 큰 용사라 그들의 자손 중에 능히 출전할 만한 자가 만 칠천이백 명이며

sentences.original_text: All these the sons of Jediael
by the heads of their fathers
were seventeen thousand and two hundred soldiers
fit to go out for war and battle
